Package Model

Interface Accounts

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AdminAccounts, MoviegoerAccounts
public interface Accounts extends Serializable
Represents the Interface class used to store the accounts of our app users. Can be implemented by any Class that has a data structure to store account information. All subclasses will be Serializable.
Since:
2022-11-12

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Boolean
    isUser(String inputId)
    Checks if a User's ID exists in a data structure.
    Boolean
    validateUser(String id, String pwd)
    Checks if an input User's ID matches with the corresponding password in the data structure.

  • Method Details

    • isUser

      Boolean isUser(String inputId)
      Checks if a User's ID exists in a data structure.
      Parameters:
      inputId - This is the ID inputted by the User.
      Returns:
      true if ID exists in data structure; returns false if otherwise.

    • validateUser

      Boolean validateUser(String id, String pwd)
      Checks if an input User's ID matches with the corresponding password in the data structure.
      Parameters:
      id - This is the ID inputted by the User.
      pwd - This is the password inputted by the User.
      Returns:
      true if ID matches with password; returns false if otherwise.
